original_title: Sri Lanka to import railway tracks from China
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka has decided to import 10,000 railway tracks from China.
The Ministry of Transport said that the railway tracks will be imported using a fund facility provided by the Asian Development Bank.
The Ministry said that the railway tracks will reach Sri Lanka by the end of May.
